roleset.name: ponder at length and unhappily
roleset.note: BROOD-V NOTES: Frames file for 'brood' based on sentences in brown. (from brood.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: brood-v: with no topic
example.text: [Moreland]*-1 sat [*-1]brooding for a full minute, during which I made each of us a new drink.

roleset.name: protect and hatch eggs
roleset.note: BROOD-V, BROODING-N NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-biotexts

example.name: brood-v
example.text: The empty egg cases of an octopus that-1 *-1 brooded her eggs for 4.5 years in Monterey Canyon.

example.name: brooding-n
example.text: In males without these pouches , eggs adhere to a strip of soft skin on the ventral surface of their bodies that does not contain any exterior covering - a type of `` skin brooding ''
